user_criteria.name: Unite public
user_criteria.script: /** Scripted User Criteria is not cached, and evaluated everytime, so performance is dependent on the script. * Populate `answer` with true/false or evaluate to true/false * The script is evaluated in the scope the user criteria is defined * Don't use `current` in the script or populate the variable * Don't use `gs.getUser()` or `gs.getUserID()`, * instead use `user_id` which contains the user sys_id against whom the evaluation is happening. */

sys_update_version.name: user_criteria_3619935a8345ca1076389630ceaad34e
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="user_criteria"><user_criteria action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><advanced>false</advanced><company/><department/><group/><location/><match_all>false</match_all><name>Unite public</name><role name="public">b0593b350a0a0aa7001d689e4542dc28</role><script><![CDATA[/** Scripted User Criteria is not cached, and evaluated everytime, so performance is dependent on the script. * Populate `answer` with true/false or evaluate to true/false * The script is evaluated in the scope the user criteria is defined * Don't use `current` in the script or populate the variable * Don't use `gs.getUser()` or `gs.getUserID()`, * instead use `user_id` which contains the user sys_id against whom the evaluation is happening. */]]></script><short_description/><sys_class_name>user_criteria</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-22 13:05:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3619935a8345ca1076389630ceaad34e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Unite public</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Unite University" source="x_1342897_unite_un">64c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Unite University">64c5b50d8309061076389630ceaad3f1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>user_criteria_3619935a8345ca1076389630ceaad34e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-22 13:05:42</sys_updated_on><user/></user_criteria><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3619935a8345ca1076389630ceaad34e"/></record_update>
